__note__: This is file is autogenerated, do not edit it manually. For more info https://data.aoe4world.com/

data.name: Additional Torches
data.description: Increase the torch damage of all infantry and cavalry by +3.
data.descriptionCN: 所有步兵和骑兵的火炬伤害 +3。

data.name: Additional Torches (Improved)
data.description:
Increase the torch damage of all infantry and cavalry by +5.
If Additional Torches has already been researched, increase the torch damage from all infantry and cavalry by +2.
data.descriptionCN:
所有步兵和骑兵的火炬伤害 +5。
如果已完成更多火炬研究，则所有步兵和骑兵的火炬伤害 +2。

data.name: Adjustable Crossbars
data.description: Increases Mangonel range by +1, blast radius by +75%, and adds +1 projectile to attacks.
data.descriptionCN: 投石车射程 +1，爆炸范围 +75%，且攻击抛射物 +1。

data.name: Angled Surfaces
data.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Armored Hull
data.description: Increase the health of all military ships by +20% and ranged armor by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有军事船只的生命值 +20%，远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Arrowslits
data.description: Add defensive arrowslits to this structure and increase garrison arrow range by +1. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.
data.descriptionCN: 为此建筑添加防御型射箭槽并使驻扎单位的弓箭攻击范围 +1。只能添加一座武器炮台。

data.name: Balanced Projectiles
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有弓箭和弩箭的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Biology
data.description: Investing in natural sciences increases the health of all cavalry by +25%.
data.descriptionCN: 投资自然科学可使所有骑兵的生命值 +25%。

data.name: Biology (Improved)
data.description:
Investing in natural sciences increases the health of all cavalry by +35%.
If Biology has already been researched, increase it by +10% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
投资自然科学可使所有骑兵的生命值 +35%。
如果已完成生物学研究，则 +10%。

data.name: Bloomery
data.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战伤害 +1。

data.name: Cannon Emplacement
data.description: Add a defensive cannon emplacement to this structure. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.
data.descriptionCN: 为此建筑添加一座防御型加农炮炮台。只能添加一座武器炮台。

data.name: Chemistry
data.description: Advancements in alchemical research increase the bonus damage of all gunpowder siege weapons by +25%.
data.descriptionCN: 炼金术研究的进步使所有火药攻城武器的伤害加成 +25%。

data.name: Court Architects
data.description: Patronage of the finest builders increases all building health by +30%.
data.descriptionCN: 资助最优秀的建筑工可使所有建筑的生命值 +30%。

data.name: Crosscut Saw
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15% and Wood gatherers carry capacity by +5.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的木材采集速率 +15%，木材采集者运载量 +5。

data.name: Cupellation
data.description: Gold gatherers drop off 15% more resources.
data.descriptionCN: 黄金采集者存放资源量额外 +15%。

data.name: Damascus Steel
data.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战伤害 +1。

data.name: Decarbonization
data.description: Increase the melee damage of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战伤害 +1。

data.name: Double Broadax
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的木材采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Double Broadax (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 35%.
If Double Broadax has already been researched, increase it by 20% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
村民的木材采集速率 +35%。
如果已完成双宽斧研究，则 +20%。

data.name: Drift Nets
data.description: Increase the gathering rate of Fishing Ships by +10%, carry capacity by +20 and move speed by +10%.
data.descriptionCN: 渔船的采集速率 +10%，运载量 +20，移动速度 +10%。

data.name: Elite Army Tactics
data.description: Training elite infantry leads to improved prowess in battle. Melee Infantry gain +15% damage and +15% health.
data.descriptionCN: 训练精锐步兵可提高战斗力。近战步兵获得伤害 +15% 和生命值 +15%。

data.name: Elite Army Tactics (Improved)
data.description:
Training elite infantry leads to improved prowess in battle. Melee Infantry gain +20% damage and +20% health.
If Elite Army Tactics has already been researched, increases damage by +5% and health by +5% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
训练精锐步兵可提高战斗力。近战步兵获得伤害 +20% 和生命值 +20%。
如果已完成精锐军队战术的研究，则伤害 +5%，生命值 +5%。

data.name: Explosives
data.description: Increase the damage of Incendiary Ships by +40%.
data.descriptionCN: 燃烧船伤害 +40%。

data.name: Extended Lines
data.description: Increase the gathering rate of Fishing Ships by +15% and carry capacity by +10.
data.descriptionCN: 渔船的采集速率 +15%，运载量 +10。

data.name: Extra Hammocks
data.description: Increases the number of arrows fired by Archer Ships by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 步弓手船只射出的箭矢数量 +1。

data.name: Fertilization
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的食物采集速率 +10%，不包括狩猎肉类。

data.name: Fitted Leatherwork
data.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战护甲 +1。

data.name: Forestry
data.description: Double the rate at which Villagers chop down trees.
data.descriptionCN: 村民伐木速率加倍。

data.name: Forestry (Improved)
data.description:
Villagers fell trees in a single chop.
Wood carry capacity increased by +2.
data.descriptionCN:
村民一击便能伐倒树木。
木材运载量 +2。

data.name: Geometry
data.description: Increase damage of Trebuchets by +20%.
data.descriptionCN: 巨型投石机的伤害 +20%。

data.name: Geometry (Improved)
data.description:
Increase damage of Trebuchets by +30%.
If Geometry has already been researched, increase their damage by +10% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
巨型投石机的伤害 +30%。
如果已完成几何学的研究，则伤害 +10%。

data.name: Greased Axles
data.description: Increase the movement speed of siege engines by +15%.
data.descriptionCN: 攻城器械的移动速度 +15%。

data.name: Greased Axles (Improved)
data.description:
Increase the movement speed of siege engines by +25%.
If Greased Axles has already been researched, increase it by +10% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
攻城器械的移动速度 +25%。
如果已完成润滑轮轴研究，则 +10%。

data.name: Heated Shot
data.description: Archer Ship arrows light enemy Ships on fire, dealing damage over time.
data.descriptionCN: 步弓手船箭点燃敌方战舰，造成持续伤害。

data.name: Herbal Medicine
data.description: Increase the healing rate of religious units and healers by +60%.
data.descriptionCN: 宗教单位和治疗者的治疗速率 +60%。

data.name: Herbal Medicine (Improved)
data.description:
Increase the healing rate of religious units by +90%.
If Herbal Medicine has already been researched, increase it by +30% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
宗教单位的治疗速率 +90%。
如果已完成草药研究，则 +30%。

data.name: Horticulture
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的食物采集速率 +10%，不包括狩猎肉类。

data.name: Horticulture (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 30%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
If Horticulture has already been researched, increase it by 20% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
村民的食物采集速率 +30%，不包括狩猎肉类。
如果已完成园艺学研究，则 +20%。

data.name: Incendiaries
data.description: Incendiary Ships gain +20% explosion range.
data.descriptionCN: 燃烧船的爆炸范围 +20%。

data.name: Incendiary Arrows
data.description: Flammable munitions grant non-gunpowder ranged units a siege arrow or bolt when attacking buildings and increase their damage by +20%.
data.descriptionCN: 易燃弹药可为非火药远程单位在攻击建筑物时提供攻城箭矢或弩箭，并使其伤害 +20%。

data.name: Insulated Helm
data.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战护甲 +1。

data.name: Iron Undermesh
data.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Lightweight Beams
data.description: Increase Battering Ram attack speed by +20% and reduce their field construction time by -50%.
data.descriptionCN: 攻城锤攻击速度 +20%，战场工程时间 -50%。

data.name: Lightweight Beams (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Battering Ram attack speed by +30% and reduce their field construction time by -75%.
If Lightweight Beams has already been researched, increase attack speed by +10% and reduce field construction time by -25% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
攻城锤攻击速度 +30%，战场工程时间 -75%。
如果已经研究过轻质横梁，攻击速度 +10%，战场工程时间 -25%。

data.name: Lumber Preservation
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Wood by 15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的木材采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Master Smiths
data.description: Increase the melee armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的近战护甲 +1。

data.name: Military Academy
data.description:
Increase the production speed of infantry, cavalry, siege, and transport units at buildings by 33%.
Does not affect religious units or other support units.
data.descriptionCN:
建筑中的步兵、骑兵、攻城以及运输工具单位的生产速度 +33%。
该效果不适用于宗教单位或其他辅助单位。

data.name: Military Academy (Improved)
data.description:
Increase the production speed of military and transport units at buildings by 53%.
Does not affect religious or other support units.
If Military Academy has already been researched, increase production speed by 20% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
建筑中的军事和运输工具单位的生产速度提升 53%。
该效果不适用于宗教单位或其他辅助单位。
如果已经研究过军事学院，生产速度则提升 20%。

data.name: Monastic Shrines
data.description: Prayer Tents allow Improved Production within their influence even without an Ovoo.
data.descriptionCN: 祈祷帐篷可在没有敖包的情况下为其影响范围内提供强化生产效果。

data.name: Naval Arrowslits
data.description: Add a defensive arrowslit to this Dock which only attacks ships.
data.descriptionCN: 在这个码头上添加一个防御型射箭槽，只会对船只作出攻击。

data.name: Pax Mongolica
data.description: Add +300 health and +3 fire armor to all Outposts.
data.descriptionCN: 所有哨站的生命值 +300，火焰护甲 +3。

data.name: Piety
data.description: Increase the health of religious units and healers by +40.
data.descriptionCN: 宗教单位和治疗者的生命值 +40。

data.name: Piety (Improved)
data.description:
Increase all Shamans' health by +60.
If Piety has already been researched, increase it by +20 instead.
data.descriptionCN:
所有萨满的生命值 +60。
如果已完成虔诚研究，则 +20。

data.name: Piracy
data.description: Gain +25 Wood and +25 Gold when sinking an enemy ship.
data.descriptionCN: 击沉一艘敌方船只时可获得 +25 木材和 +25 黄金。

data.name: Platecutter Point
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有弓箭和弩箭的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Precision Cross-Breeding
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Food by 10%. Does not apply to hunted meat.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的食物采集速率 +10%，不包括狩猎肉类。

data.name: Professional Scouts
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.
data.descriptionCN:
侦察兵获得携带动物尸骸的能力，且对野生动物造成的伤害 +100%。
侦察兵在携带动物尸骸时移动速度 -55%，且无法拾取野猪尸骸。若携带的是鹿尸骸，则会缓慢腐烂。

data.name: Raid Bounty
data.description: Increase the raid income for igniting a building to +50 Food and Gold.
data.descriptionCN: 点燃建筑带来的突袭收入 +50 食物和黄金。

data.name: Raid Bounty (Improved)
data.description:
Increase the raid income for igniting a building to +75 Food and Gold.
If Raid Bounty has already been researched, increase the raid income for igniting a building by +25 Food and Gold.
data.descriptionCN:
点燃建筑带来的突袭收入 +75 食物和黄金。
如果已完成突袭赏金研究，则点燃建筑带来的突袭收入 +25 食物和黄金。

data.name: Roller Shutter Triggers
data.description: Increases Springald attack speed by +25% and grants +10% Ranged Resistance.
data.descriptionCN: 扭力弩炮攻击速度 +25%，并且获得 +10% 远程抗性。

data.name: Roller Shutter Triggers (Improved)
data.description:
Increases Springald attack speed by +35%, grants +10% Ranged Resistance, and increases health by +10.
If Roller Shutter Triggers has already been researched, increase attack speed by 10% and health by +10 instead.
data.descriptionCN:
扭力弩炮攻击速度 +35%，远程抗性 +10%，生命值 +10。
如果已研究卷帘式触发器，则攻击速度 +10%，生命值 +10。

data.name: Serpentine Powder
data.description: With new gunpowder, Handcannoneers gain +5 damage against melee infantry and gain a brief increase to their movement speed after firing their weapon.
data.descriptionCN: 使用新型火药，火枪兵对近战步兵的伤害 +5，并在武器开火后短暂提高移动速度。

data.name: Shaft Mining
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的黄金采集速率提升 15%。

data.name: Shipwrights
data.description: Increase the health of all military ships by +20% and ranged armor by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有军事船只的生命值 +20%，远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Siege Engineering
data.description: Melee and ranged infantry can construct Siege Towers and Battering Rams in the field.
data.descriptionCN: 近战和远程步兵可以在战场中建造攻城塔和攻城锤。

data.name: Siege Engineering (Improved)
data.description: Melee and ranged infantry can construct Siege Towers and Battering Rams in the field. Improved Siege Engineering allows for the construction of Mangonels, Springalds and Trebuchets as well.
data.descriptionCN: 近战和远程步兵可在战场上建造攻城塔和攻城锤。强化攻城工程学还能让这些单位建造轻型投石车、扭力弩炮和巨型投石机。

data.name: Siege Works
data.description: New carpentry techniques increase the health of siege units by +20%.
data.descriptionCN: 新的木工技术可使攻城部队的生命值 +20%。

data.name: Siege Works (Improved)
data.description:
New carpentry techniques increase the health of siege engines by +30%.
If Siege Works has already been researched, increase their health by +10% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
新的木工技术可使攻城部队的生命值 +30%。
如果已完成攻城武器研究，则其生命值 +10%。

data.name: Siha Bow Limbs
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 蒙古突骑和汗的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Siha Bow Limbs (Improved)
data.description:
Increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +2.
If Siha Bow Limbs has already been researched, increase the ranged damage of Mangudai and the Khan by +1.
data.descriptionCN:
蒙古突骑和汗的远程伤害 +2。
如果已完成西哈弓臂研究，则蒙古突骑和汗的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Silk Bowstrings
data.description: Stringing bows with silk grants Archers +1.5 range and Mounted Archers +0.75 range.
data.descriptionCN: 用丝线制作弓弦可以使弓兵的射程 +1.5，使骑射手的射程 +0.75。

data.name: Specialized Pick
data.description: Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的黄金采集速率提升 15%。

data.name: Specialized Pick (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Villagers' gathering rate for Gold by 35%.
If Specialized Pick has already been researched, increase it by 20% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
村民的黄金采集速率提升 35%。
如果已完成特制矿锄研究，则提升 20%。

data.name: Springald Crews
data.description: Springald Ships gain +1 range and attack 20% faster.
data.descriptionCN: 扭力弩炮船的攻击范围 +1 ，攻击速度 +20%。

data.name: Springald Emplacement
data.description: Add a defensive springald emplacement to this structure. Only one weapon emplacement can be added.
data.descriptionCN: 为此建筑添加一座防御型扭力弩炮炮台。只能添加一座武器炮台。

data.name: Spyglass
data.description: Increase the sight radius of Scouts by 30%.
data.descriptionCN: 侦察兵的视线半径增加 30%。

data.name: Steeled Arrow
data.description: Increase the ranged damage of all arrows and bolts by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有弓箭和弩箭的远程伤害 +1。

data.name: Steppe Lancers
data.description: Increase Keshik healing by +1 Health per attack and attack speed by +10%.
data.descriptionCN: 每次攻击怯薛骑兵恢复的生命值提升 +1，攻击速度增加 +10%。

data.name: Steppe Lancers (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Keshik healing by +2 Health per attack and attack speed by +20%.
If Steppe Lancers has already been researched, increase Keshik healing by +1 Health per attack and attack speed by +10%.
data.descriptionCN:
每次攻击怯薛骑兵恢复的生命值提升 +2，攻击速度增加 +20%。
如果已完成草原长矛骑兵研究，每次攻击怯薛骑兵恢复的生命值提升 +1，攻击速度增加 +10%。

data.name: Stone Bounty
data.description: Add +50 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.
data.descriptionCN: 点燃建筑带来的突袭收入 +50 石料。

data.name: Stone Bounty (Improved)
data.description:
Add +75 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.
If Stone Bounty has already been researched, add +25 Stone to the raid income for igniting a building.
data.descriptionCN:
点燃建筑带来的突袭收入 +75 石料。
如果已完成石料赏金研究，则点燃建筑带来的突袭收入 +25 石料。

data.name: Stone Commerce
data.description: Traders supply +10% Stone to their trades.
data.descriptionCN: 商人交易时供应的石料 +10%。

data.name: Stone Commerce (Improved)
data.description:
Traders supply +20% Stone to their trades.
If Stone Commerce has already been researched, supply +10% Stone instead.
data.descriptionCN:
商人在交易时供应的石料 +20%。
如果已完成石料商业研究，则供应的石料 +10%。

data.name: Superior Mobility
data.description: Packed buildings move and pack/unpack 50% faster.
data.descriptionCN: 组装建筑的移动和组装/拆装速度提高 50%。

data.name: Superior Mobility (Improved)
data.description:
Packed buildings move +70% faster and pack/unpack +50% faster.
If Superior Mobility has already been researched, increase speed by +20% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
收起的建筑移动速度 +70%，收起/展开的速度 +50%。
如果已经研究过卓越机动性，则速度会 +20%。

data.name: Survival Techniques
data.description: Increase Villagers' hunted meat gather rate by +15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民狩猎肉类采集速率 +15%。

data.name: Survival Techniques (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Villagers' hunted meat gather rate by +25%.
If Survival Techniques has already been researched, increase hunted meat gather rate by +10% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
村民狩猎肉类采集速率 +25%。
如果已完成生存技术研究，则村民狩猎肉类采集速率 +10%。

data.name: Swivel Cannon
data.description: Springald Ships gain an additional Cannon which fires in 360 degrees.
data.descriptionCN: 扭力弩炮船获得了一门额外的加农炮，可以 360 度射击。

data.name: Textiles
data.description: Increase Villagers' health by +50%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民生命值 +50%。

data.name: Textiles (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Villagers' health by +50%.
If Textiles has already been researched, increase health by +100% instead.
data.descriptionCN:
村民生命值 +50%。
如果已完成纺织品研究，则生命值 +100%。

data.name: Tithe Barns
data.description: Relics placed in a Prayer Tent provide an income of +40 Food, +40 Wood, and +10 Stone every minute.
data.descriptionCN: 放置在祈祷帐篷的圣物每分钟都会提供 40 食物、40 木材和 10 石料收入。

data.name: Tithe Barns (Improved)
data.description:
Relics placed in a Prayer Tent provide an income of +60 Food, +60 Wood, and +15 Stone every minute.
If Tithe Barns has already been researched, increase the income of Food and Wood by +20 and Stone by +5 instead.
data.descriptionCN:
放置在祈祷帐篷里的圣物每分钟会提供 +60 食物、+60 木材和 +15 石料收入。
如果已完成什一税仓库研究，则食物和木材收入分别 +20，石料收入 +5。

data.name: Wedge Rivets
data.description: Increase the ranged armor of all non-siege units by +1.
data.descriptionCN: 所有非攻城单位的远程护甲 +1。

data.name: Wheelbarrow
data.description: Increase the carry capacity of Villagers by +5 and their movement speed by +15%.
data.descriptionCN: 村民的运载量 +5，移动速度 +15%。

data.name: Wheelbarrow (Improved)
data.description:
Increase Villagers' resource carry capacity by +9 and movement speed by +15%.
If Wheelbarrow has already been researched, increase carry capacity by +4 instead.
data.descriptionCN:
村民的资源运载量 +9，移动速度 +15%。
如果已完成独轮推车研究，则资源运载量 +4。

data.name: Whistling Arrows
data.description: Increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +5 seconds and range by +2 tiles.
data.descriptionCN: 汗的信号箭持续时间 +5 秒，且攻击范围 +2 格。

data.name: Whistling Arrows (Improved)
data.description:
Increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +7 seconds and range by +3 tiles.
If Whistling Arrows has already been researched, increase the Khan's Signal Arrow duration by +2 seconds and range by +1 tile.
data.descriptionCN:
汗的信号箭持续时间 +7 秒，且攻击范围 +3 格。
如果已完成镝矢研究，则汗的信号箭持续时间 +2 秒，且攻击范围 +1 格。

data.name: Yam Network
data.description: Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.
data.descriptionCN: 所有单位都可获得驿站速度光环效果，而非仅限商人和骑兵单位。此效果不适用于攻城器械。

data.name: Yam Network (Improved)
data.description:
Yam speed aura applies to all units instead of just Traders and cavalry units. Does not apply to siege engines.
Improved Yam Network allows Traders to regenerate 1 health every 2 seconds while in Yam's aura.
data.descriptionCN:
所有单位都可获得驿站速度光环效果，而非仅限商人和骑兵单位。此效果不适用于攻城器械。
强化驿站网络可令位于驿站光环下的商人每 2 秒可恢复 1 生命值。
